art.author: andydoc
art.post: The Bible says: In the mouth of two or three witnesses the truth shall be established, well so far I would say we have Akaine (1) Colton (2) and Likeness to Shroud of Turin (3). The Truth is established, and Jesus is The Way the Truth and The Life – no man comes to the but through Jesus – remember Colton’s horrific outburst at his first funeral after vsisiting heaven? Asking loudly, passionately wondering whether or not the deceased had Jesus in his heart? He had to have Jesus in his heart Colton kept exclaiming in order to enter in to heaven..
art.title: More on Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Shroud

art.post: In John 14:6 Jesus said to Thomas: “I am The Way, The Truth, and The Life, No one comes to the Father except through Me.”.
